update.releaseNotes:
v1.4.0 - Changelog
New --- - Dropped required API from 26 to 24, supporting emulators like Bluestacks and devices at least Android 7.0+ (Nougat). - Added support for the new Characters: Matikanefukukitaru (Full Armor), Hishi Akebono. - Added support for the new Support Cards: SSR Friendship Riko Kashimoto, SSR Power Rice Shower, SSR Stamina Mihono Bourbon, SSR Guts Twin Turbo, SSR Intelligence Biwa Hayahide, SSR Stamina Silence Suzuka.
